english.segment1: Join with me in graceful dance. And summon the company of angels. The heavens and earth bear witness to this. While all of creation will sing
english.segment2: (Chorus). Only to you for all eternity. Our voices sing and praise. Only to you all heaven will celebrate. Our Savior our King. Only to you. Only to you. Only to you
english.segment3: The one that I love my heart has seen. The day will come-the return of our King. Knees will bow and tongues will confess. All nations all tribes they will sing
english.segment5: Join with me in graceful dance. And summon the company of angels. The heavens and earth bear witness to this. While all of creation will sing
